scholarship_information.summary: Information was compiled from the provided dataset and web search results. The dataset indicates that the 'Shree Devi Education Trust' provides scholarships to students from low-income families. However, specific fee and scholarship pages on the official websites are often marked as 'Page will be updated soon'. Web search results provide some additional indicative details.

location_details.address: Airport Road, Kenjar, Mangalore – 574142, Karnataka State
location_details.notes: Located near Mangalore International Airport, approximately 12 km from the railway station.

details: The Trust provides scholarships for students from low-income families.
Scholarships for reserved categories (SC/ST/OBC) are mentioned.
Merit-based scholarships may be offered to students with high marks in qualifying exams.

details: The Shree Devi Education Trust offers scholarships to deserving students.
Students can apply for various government scholarships.
Specific government scholarships mentioned include 'Post Matric Scholarship', 'SC/ST scholarship', and 'Minority scholarship'.
Application portals mentioned are the 'National Scholarship Portal (NSP)' and 'Karnataka State Scholarship Portal (SSP)'.
